name: Conversus (Wolderado)
description:
Your body has been stolen by a rival king. Can you return to your body and save the kindom?

Unique Dialogue System

Your close friends doesn't know who you are. So you need to convince them. You need to pick the right choices by using the information from both Apperance and Memory.

Features:
  • Adventure gameplay
  • Unique dialogue system
  • Sweet animations
  • Puzzles
Story

The age of magic and kingdom
Wonham is a kingdom that lives in prosperity, and the leader ruling it is a wise and strong man, Edward. However, his nemesis, Garland, has a plan to finish his reign. Garland commands his dark wizards to make a stone that can transport bodies. Wizards work hard and prepare the stone and name it "Conversus” Garland, commanded his knights to kill the wizards who made the stone to keep the secret of reversing the magic. One of the wizards was able to escape to Wonham, Garland went to  Wonham capital and stole the body ofEdward, commanded his knights to kill him. Edward runs away from his castle and hides in the woods until he finds a shed. Edward finds an old man there, who is the only wizard that managed to escape from Garland. Wizard tells Edward that if he can breakthe stone, he can reverse the magic. Edward has to save his beloved Wonham.
